ADMIN_EMAIL_INVALID: Email must be a valid email address.
ADMIN_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ADMIN_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
ADMIN_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
ADMIN_PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number.
ADMIN_PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR: Password must contain at least one special character (@$!%*?&).
ADMIN_PASSWORD_ALLOWED_CHARS: Password can only contain letters, numbers, and special characters (@$!%*?&).
